## Checklist

<!-- Please check the relevant options and remove those that do not apply. -->

- [ ] I have updated the `CHANGELOG-CFX.md` file.
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code.
- [ ] I have successfully tested my changes locally.
- [ ] I have added tests to verify my changes.
- [ ] I have ensured that new and existing tests pass locally.
- [ ] I have commented on my code, especially in complex areas.
